page.title: 10HOUSING IN LISDOART
page.content: Lisdoart is situated two and a half miles from Ballygawley. There are no shopping facilities. There are no facilities for children to play in the Lisdoart area and the residents suggest that the proper leisure and shopping facilities should be developed. In the Lisdoart area there is a row of terraced houses known as Lisdoart terrace. There are seventeen houses with sixtytwo people living there. There are two bedrooms in each house. There is also a large garden behind each of the two-storey houses. Lisdoart is mainly a farming area, the main crops being grown are barley and potatoes.
